conversation.aPrompt: What is the goal of the With the help of initiative?
conversation.bResponse: The goal of the With The Help Of Initiative is to provide assistance and support for individuals and communities facing challenges and obstacles. By offering resources, guidance, and expertise, this initiative aims to empower people to overcome difficulties and achieve their goals. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/about
